function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased presence of ticks in urban green spaces","Impact":"Higher risk of people encountering disease-carrying ticks","Mitigation":"Implementing tick control measures and informing the public about tick-borne diseases","Technologies":"Tick control measures, public education campaigns","People":"General public, park visitors, outdoor enthusiasts","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"},{"Description":"Zoonotic tick-borne pathogens in urban areas","Impact":"Potential spread of tick-borne diseases to human populations","Mitigation":"Implementing surveillance programs to monitor tick populations and disease prevalence","Technologies":"Tick surveillance technology, testing for tick-borne pathogens","People":"Public health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions"}]}
